raw_comment: pessimistic countries, the countries' different perspectives could reference their internal problematics and their own ways of trying to solve them. ace_sentences: A country's perspective can refer to the country's internal problems.
Each country has its own way to solve its internal problems.
The data can give a glimpse of how effective each country's treatment is.
The treatment concerns two age ranges.
The two age ranges are not too distant.
The purpose is to improve the future generations of a country.
The data can help to obtain the possibility of this improvement.
